participant_abstract.sent: The meeting was much more successful than the first.
Everyone had a chance to pursue some research in their area, so we were working off some facts, rather than just hypotheticals and our own experience.
I thought I was able to move through the agenda effectively.

participant_actions.sent: ID - figure out call device and DVD possibilities.

participant_problems.sent: Discussion of Ipod like button capabilities.
Do we want/can it be DVD compatible?
